thing-type.label: WD500Z-1 Wall Dimmer Switch
thing-type.description: Wall Dimmer Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt500W, 120 VAC Wall Mounted Dimmer</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPushing the top or bottom of the switch, the WD500Z-1 allows the user to include or exclude the module from the Z-Wave network.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPushing the top or bottom of the switch, the WD500Z-1 allows the user to include or exclude the module from the Z-Wave network.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Dim Start Level
parameter.description: Start dimming from that start level or current level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtA dimmer receiving this command will start dimming from that start level if this bit is set to 0. If the bit is set to 1, the dimmer will ignore the start level and instead start dimming from its current level.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: LED Indication
parameter.description: The WD500Z-1 will flicker its LED when it is transmitting to any of its groups.

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Invert Switch
parameter.description: Reverse switch direction<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTo change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom to ON change parameter to 1.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: Enable Shade Control Group 2
parameter.description: The switch can control shade control devices if this parameter is set to 1

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: Enable Shade Control Group 3
parameter.description: The switch can control shade control devices if this parameter is set to 1.

parameter.name: config_19_1
parameter.label: 19: LED Transmission Indication
parameter.description: LED mode while transmitting<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe WD500Z-1 will flicker its LED when it is transmitting to any of its groups.</p&gt <p&gtParameter set to 0 = not flicker</p&gt <p&gtParameter set to 1 = flicker the entire time of transmitting</p&gt <p&gtParameter set to 2 = flicker for only 1 second.</p&gt</p&gt
